price: "Rabbimiz! Azabı bizden kaldır. Doğrusu biz iman eden kimseleriz. (derler)"
arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ik'shif ʿannā al-ʿadhāba innā mu'minūna
